website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for a clean, lightweight, simple pair of sports sunglasses with polarized lenses to reduce glare, these are a great pair. Surprisingly inexpensive for the durability they deliver. We like the lifetime frame breakage warranty.
pros: Lightweight, multi-sport, strong, polarized sport sunglasses with 100% UV protection from UVA, UVB, UVC and blue light, helping to reduce eye fatigue
Hammer-proof lens for extra strength, with lifetime warranty on frame breakage
Includes case, cleaning cloth, and glasses bag
cons: Could be too large on smaller faces

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive sunglasses that look good on my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband leads an active lifestyle and loses or breaks his sunglasses regularly. (The most recent pair broke when he was at a jousting tournament and someone plopped a piece of plate armour on top of the glasses which he'd left on a table.) So I tend to buy him inexpensive sunglasses in bulk. He really likes these glasses. They are the only ones that he has specifically asked me to buy more of. They look good on him, too.
customer_reviews.author: Zhi Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these several times because I constantly lose my glasses. They have been a solid for me, on had one set break on me and was because they were on top of my head and I smashed my head on the roof of the Ambulance. I have also used them to take a ride on a Harley and were great for that also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of inexpensive Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to spend big on sunglasses, so I've been very pleased with these. I've actually purchased two pairs and have found them to be a great, versatile pair that i can use for everything from working in the yard to outdoor formal events. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ASturge37

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: The polarized lenses are quite excellent, but sometimes the nose-piece irritates my nose slightly. Aside from that, they are excellent glasses that really do a great job of cutting glare from the sun with the best lenses (polarized) that do not distort the colors you see.
customer_reviews.author: Melekali

customer_reviews.title: Work great on the Pickleball court
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. A plus is that they don't fall off in fast playing sports. Lenses provide clear view. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: He loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend because he didn't have any sunglasses of his own and on his way to work the sun is always in his eyes. He really likes them. He wears them every day. They were a great product for the price I'd say. I've thought about ordering myself a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price but wouldn’t purchase it again .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: As describe and well made very durable and affordable thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lou1

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just went to a trip to Rocky Mountains where it was very sunny, this glasses worked very well! Delivery was fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Epic

customer_reviews.title: Low price excellent quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome good quality sunglasses. I recommend this product over most expensive other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

product_meta.title: AOKNES Polarized Sports Sunglasses, Fishing Baseball Running Sunglass for Men Women, Lightweight Outdoor Activity Eyewear
product_meta.description:
Polarized Sports Sunglasses for Women, Men with Hiking, Climbing and Picnicing-100% UV400 Protection
Feature
Material: Tr90 durable superlight frame and PC polarized lens.Compared with the traditional TAC polarized lens, it overcomes spherical astigmatism resulting from frame deforms.
Specially designed with the needs of cyclist, tourist and walker in mind.
Perfect flexible size for all face whether for men or for women.
Rubber nose pads and foot: skin-friendly and prevents the frame from falling when the sweat is dripping.

Dimension
Lens height:40 mm (1.57 inches)
Lens width:64mm (2.52 inches)
Leg length:140mm(5.51 inches)
Nose bridge:30 mm ( 1.18 inches)
Frame length:140 mm (5.51 inches)

About returns policy and our services
Please feel free to leave us a message if you have any questions. We will reply to you within 24 hours and offer you our best services.

Package included
1*Sports Sunglasses
1*Exquisite Hard Case
1*Soft Glasses Cloth
1*Soft Microfiber Pouch
1*Polarized Testing Card
feature_bullets: -TR90 SUPERLIGHT FRAME: Higher flexibility and safety, weigh about 23g, suitable for all face.
-UV400 PROTECTION PC POLARIZED LENS: Good toughness and impact resistance, perfect to protect your eyes from UVA, UVB, wind, insects and dust.
-STYLISH & DURABLE DESIGN: Adopt comfortable skin-friendy rubber material in nose pads and foot, prevent the FRAME from falling whether for running, cycling, driving and so on.
-ATTENTION: Try not to wear sunglasses for a long time; These people try not to wear: Age under 6, glaucoma, color blindness, neuroretinitis and Night blindness.
-WARRANTY: Includes 45 days limited warranty for this polarized sports sunglasses.
